parameter.description: ReferÃªncia (informe a primeira data do ano)

var.expression: SELECT TO_CHAR(:REFERENCIA,'YYYY') AS ANO FROM DUAL

grid.expression: SELECT CODIGO, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 AND CODIGO NOT IN (1600000000) THEN ''||DESCRICAO||'' WHEN GRAU = 2 AND CODIGO IN (0101000000) THEN ''||DESCRICAO||'' ELSE ''||DESCRICAO END AS DRE_GERENCIAL, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 AND CODIGO NOT IN (0200000000,1600000000) THEN '#8EA9DB' WHEN GRAU = 2 AND ANALITICO <> 'S' OR CODIGO = 0200000000 THEN '#c7ecee' ELSE 'white' END AS BKCOLOR, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 THEN 'black' WHEN GRAU = 2 THEN ' ' ELSE ' ' END AS FGCOLOR, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,0), 'N')),0) AS JANEIRO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,1), 'N')),0) AS FEVEREIRO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,2), 'N')),0) AS MARCO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,3), 'N')),0) AS ABRIL, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,4), 'N')),0) AS MAIO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,5), 'N')),0) AS JUNHO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,6), 'N')),0) AS JULHO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,7), 'N')),0) AS AGOSTO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,8), 'N')),0) AS SETEMBRO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,9), 'N')),0) AS OUTUBRO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,10), 'N')),0) AS NOVEMBRO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,11), 'N')),0) AS DEZEMBRO FROM AD_DREGERENCIAL WHERE CODIGO >= 100000000 AND CODIGO NOT IN (1500000000,2100000000,2000000000) UNION ALL SELECT CODIGO, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 AND CODIGO NOT IN (1600000000) THEN ''||DESCRICAO||'' WHEN GRAU = 2 AND CODIGO IN (0101000000) THEN ''||DESCRICAO||'' ELSE ''||DESCRICAO END AS DRE_GERENCIAL, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 AND CODIGO NOT IN (0200000000,1600000000) THEN '#8EA9DB' WHEN GRAU = 2 AND ANALITICO <> 'S' OR CODIGO = 0200000000 THEN '#c7ecee' ELSE 'white' END AS BKCOLOR, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 THEN 'black' WHEN GRAU = 2 THEN ' ' ELSE ' ' END AS FGCOLOR, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,0), 'E')),0) AS JANEIRO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,1), 'E')),0) AS FEVEREIRO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,2), 'E')),0) AS MARCO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,3), 'E')),0) AS ABRIL, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,4), 'E')),0) AS MAIO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,5), 'E')),0) AS JUNHO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,6), 'E')),0) AS JULHO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,7), 'E')),0) AS AGOSTO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,8), 'E')),0) AS SETEMBRO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,9), 'E')),0) AS OUTUBRO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,10), 'E')),0)AS NOVEMBRO, NVL( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, CODIGO, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,11), 'E')),0)AS DEZEMBRO FROM AD_DREGERENCIAL WHERE CODIGO IN (2000000000) UNION ALL SELECT CODIGO, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 AND CODIGO NOT IN (1600000000) THEN ''||DESCRICAO||'' WHEN GRAU = 2 AND CODIGO IN (0101000000) THEN ''||DESCRICAO||'' ELSE ''||DESCRICAO END AS DRE_GERENCIAL, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 AND CODIGO NOT IN (0200000000,1600000000) THEN '#8EA9DB' WHEN GRAU = 2 AND ANALITICO <> 'S' OR CODIGO = 0200000000 THEN '#c7ecee' ELSE 'white' END AS BKCOLOR, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 THEN 'black' WHEN GRAU = 2 THEN ' ' ELSE ' ' END AS FGCOLOR, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,0), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,0), 'N'))*100,2) AS JANEIRO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,1), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,1), 'N'))*100,2) AS FEVEREIRO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,2), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,2), 'N'))*100,2) AS MARCO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,3), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,3), 'N'))*100,2) AS ABRIL, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,4), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,4), 'N'))*100,2) AS MAIO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,5), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,5), 'N'))*100,2) AS JUNHO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,6), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,6), 'N'))*100,2) AS JULHO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,7), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,7), 'N'))*100,2) AS AGOSTO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,8), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,8), 'N'))*100,2) AS SETEMBRO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,9), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,9), 'N'))*100,2) AS OUTUBRO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,10), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP,100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,10), 'N'))*100,2) AS NOVEMBRO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 1400000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,11), 'N')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP,100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,11), 'N'))*100,2) AS DEZEMBRO FROM AD_DREGERENCIAL WHERE CODIGO IN (1500000000) UNION ALL SELECT CODIGO, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 AND CODIGO NOT IN (1600000000) THEN ''||DESCRICAO||'' WHEN GRAU = 2 AND CODIGO IN (0101000000) THEN ''||DESCRICAO||'' ELSE ''||DESCRICAO END AS DRE_GERENCIAL, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 AND CODIGO NOT IN (0200000000,1600000000) THEN '#8EA9DB' WHEN GRAU = 2 AND ANALITICO <> 'S' OR CODIGO = 0200000000 THEN '#c7ecee' ELSE 'white' END AS BKCOLOR, CASE WHEN GRAU = 1 THEN 'black' WHEN GRAU = 2 THEN ' ' ELSE ' ' END AS FGCOLOR, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,0), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,0), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS JANEIRO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,1), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,1), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS FEVEREIRO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,2), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,2), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS MARCO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,3), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,3), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS ABRIL, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,4), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,4), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS MAIO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,5), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,5), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS JUNHO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,6), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,6), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS JULHO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,7), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,7), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS AGOSTO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,8), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,8), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS SETEMBRO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,9), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,9), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS OUTUBRO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,10), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP,100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,10), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS NOVEMBRO, ROUND( ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP, 2000000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,11), 'E')) / ABS(GET_VALORDRE_GM(:CODEMP,100000000, ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,11), 'N'))*100 ,2) AS DEZEMBRO FROM AD_DREGERENCIAL WHERE CODIGO IN (2100000000) ORDER BY 1

chart.title: EvoluÃ§Ã£o
chart.expression: SELECT :CODIGO AS CODIGO,TO_CHAR(L.REFERENCIA,'MM-YYYY') AS MES_ANO, TO_CHAR(L.REFERENCIA,'Month')||'/'||TO_CHAR(L.REFERENCIA,'YYYY') AS MES, ABS(sum((CASE WHEN L.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (L.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE L.VLRLANC END)) ) AS VALOR, '#778ca3' AS BKCOLOR FROM TCBLAN L, TCBPLA PLA WHERE PLA.CODCTACTB = L.CODCTACTB AND L.CODCTACTB IN (select codctactb from ad_dregerencial c join ad_drecontas i on c.codigo = i.codigo where c.codigo = :CODIGO AND C.CODIGO NOT IN (2000000000)) AND L.CODEMP = :CODEMP AND TO_CHAR(L.REFERENCIA,'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(:REFERENCIA,'YYYY') GROUP BY L.REFERENCIA ORDER BY TO_CHAR(L.REFERENCIA,'MM/YYYY')

simple-value.expression: SELECT CODIGO||' - '||DESCRICAO AS DESCRICAO FROM AD_DREGERENCIAL WHERE CODIGO = :CODIGO
simple-value.value-expression:
D E T A L H A M E N T O   D A   C O N T A
$DESCRICAO

grid.title: $DESCRICAO
grid.expression: SELECT CTACTB, DESCRCTA, SUM(JANEIRO) AS JANEIRO, SUM(FEVEREIRO) AS FEVEREIRO, SUM(MARCO) AS MARCO, SUM(ABRIL) AS ABRIL, SUM(MAIO) AS MAIO, SUM(JUNHO) AS JUNHO, SUM(JULHO) AS JULHO, SUM(AGOSTO) AS AGOSTO, SUM(SETEMBRO) AS SETEMBRO, SUM(OUTUBRO) AS OUTUBRO, SUM(NOVEMBRO) AS NOVEMBRO, SUM(DEZEMBRO) AS DEZEMBRO FROM ( SELECT LAN.CODEMP, LAN.REFERENCIA, PLA.CODCTACTB, PLA.CTACTB, PLA.DESCRCTA, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 1 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS JANEIRO, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 2 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS FEVEREIRO, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 3 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS MARCO, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 4 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS ABRIL, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 5 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS MAIO, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 6 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS JUNHO, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 7 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS JULHO, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 8 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS AGOSTO, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 9 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS SETEMBRO, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 10 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS OUTUBRO, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 11 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS NOVEMBRO, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(LAN.REFERENCIA,'MM') = 12 THEN (SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (LAN.VLRLANC * (-1)) ELSE LAN.VLRLANC END)) END AS DEZEMBRO FROM TCBLAN LAN INNER JOIN TCBPLA PLA ON PLA.CODCTACTB = LAN.CODCTACTB WHERE LAN.CODEMP IN (:CODEMP) AND LAN.REFERENCIA >= :REFERENCIA AND LAN.REFERENCIA <= ADD_MONTHS(:REFERENCIA,11) AND PLA.CODCTACTB IN (SELECT I.CODCTACTB FROM AD_DRECONTAS I, AD_DREGERENCIAL C WHERE I.CODIGO = C.CODIGO AND I.CODIGO = :CODIGO AND C.ANALITICO = 'S') GROUP BY LAN.CODEMP, LAN.REFERENCIA, PLA.CTACTB, PLA.DESCRCTA, PLA.CODCTACTB ORDER BY LAN.REFERENCIA )D GROUP BY CTACTB, DESCRCTA

SELECT L.*, (CASE WHEN L.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN (L.VLRLANC *(-1)) ELSE L.VLRLANC END) AS VLRLANC FROM TCBLAN L, TCBPLA PLA WHERE PLA.CODCTACTB = L.CODCTACTB AND L.CODCTACTB IN (select codctactb from ad_dregerencial c join ad_drecontas i on c.codigo = i.codigo where c.codigo = :CODIGO AND C.CODIGO NOT IN (2000000000)) AND L.CODEMP = :CODEMP AND TO_CHAR(L.REFERENCIA, 'MM-YYYY') = :A_MES_ANO ORDER BY 2
